metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22231 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A denial of service in user's profile page is found starting with GitLab CE/EE 8.0 that allows attacker to reject access to their profile page via using a specially crafted username.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
